page.title: 10FARMING -DAILY ROUTINE.
page.content: On{Tuesday 16th July}Diane and I went to{Wharfedale Grange Farm}for the day, to experience the day in the life of a farmer. A farmers day starts at 6.00am. When we arrived,{Mr. Chapman,} the farmer was washing out all the milk bottles, and pasteurising the milk. At 9.00am, we went in for breakfast. It was then back to work, which was to fill and top the milk bottles, ready for the next days delivery. At about 11.45am we were about 3/4 of the way through filling the bottles. At 1.00pm we had dinner, with{Mr. Chapman, Mrs. Chapman}and {Mrs. Chapman's mother,}who is aged 91. After lunch we went for a ride in the farmer's Landrover, into the fields containing the sheep. When we got back it was 3.45pm and at 4.00pm we started the milking, for the next days milk. As we started milking the cows one of
